alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:54PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mesa County through 830 PM MDT... At 753 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles south of Grand Junction, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Junction. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 33 and 40. Colorado 141 between mile markers 125 and 152, and between mile markers 157 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
